table.name: order_release
table.description: The early sailing date and time to be used as a constraint when planning the order release onto a buy shipment on the primary leg. This constraint only applies when the primary leg contains a voyage.

columns.name: ORDER_RELEASE_GID
columns.description: The GID for the order release.

columns.name: ORDER_RELEASE_XID
columns.description: The XID for the order release.

columns.name: ORDER_RELEASE_NAME
columns.description: An open field for you to enter another identifier (name) for the order release.

columns.name: ORDER_RELEASE_TYPE_GID
columns.description: A GID to define the type of the order release. For example: Customer order, Distribution order, Manufacturing order, Purchase order, etc.

columns.name: IS_TEMPLATE
columns.description: A Y/N indicator specifying this order release as a template if the value is Y.

columns.name: ORDER_BASE_GID
columns.description: The GID for the order base associated with the order release if this order release was generated from an order base.

columns.name: SOURCE_LOCATION_GID
columns.description: The source location GID.

columns.name: DEST_LOCATION_GID
columns.description: The destination location GID.

columns.name: EARLY_PICKUP_DATE
columns.description: The early pickup date and time defined for the order release; can be null.

columns.name: LATE_PICKUP_DATE
columns.description: The latest pickup date and time defined for the order release; can be null.

columns.name: EARLY_DELIVERY_DATE
columns.description: The early delivery date and time defined for the order release; can be null.

columns.name: LATE_DELIVERY_DATE
columns.description: The late delivery date and time defined for the order release; can be null.

columns.name: FIXED_ITINERARY_GID
columns.description: The fixed buy side itinerary can be defined to force the order release to be schedule with a constrained itinerary.

columns.name: ASSIGNED_ITINERARY_GID
columns.description: The buy side itinerary that was selected when planning the order release.

columns.name: FIXED_SELL_ITINERARY_GID
columns.description: The fixed sell side itinerary can be defined to force the order release to be schedule with a constrained itinerary.

columns.name: SHIP_UNIT_ORIGIN
columns.description: Indicates how the ship units were created (BL=order base by line, BS=order base by ship unit, RL=order release by line, RS=order release by ship unit).  If this field is not 'RS' (formerly 'U'), the system deletes all existing order ship unit for the given order release, before calling new releasing logic to generate ship unit.

columns.name: TOTAL_WEIGHT
columns.description: The total weight calculated from the order release lines.

columns.name: TOTAL_WEIGHT_UOM_CODE
columns.description: The total weight unit of measure.

columns.name: TOTAL_WEIGHT_BASE
columns.description: The total weight in the base unit of measure.

columns.name: TOTAL_VOLUME
columns.description: The total volume calculated from the order release lines.

columns.name: TOTAL_VOLUME_UOM_CODE
columns.description: The total volume unit of measure.

columns.name: TOTAL_VOLUME_BASE
columns.description: The total volume in the base unit of measure.

columns.name: TOTAL_PACKAGING_UNIT_COUNT
columns.description: The total packaging unit count calculated from the order release lines

columns.name: TOTAL_ITEM_PACKAGE_COUNT
columns.description: The total item package count calculated from the order release lines.

columns.name: MAX_LENGTH
columns.description: The max length calculated from the order release lines.

columns.name: MAX_LENGTH_UOM_CODE
columns.description: The max length unit of measure.

columns.name: MAX_LENGTH_BASE
columns.description: The max length in the base unit of measure.

columns.name: MAX_WIDTH
columns.description: The maximum width calculated from the order release lines.

columns.name: MAX_WIDTH_UOM_CODE
columns.description: The maximum width unit of measure.

columns.name: MAX_WIDTH_BASE
columns.description: The maximum width in the base unit of measure.

columns.name: MAX_HEIGHT
columns.description: The maximum height calculated from the order release lines.

columns.name: MAX_HEIGHT_UOM_CODE
columns.description: The maximum height unit of measure.

columns.name: MAX_HEIGHT_BASE
columns.description: The maximum height in the base unit of measure.

columns.name: PLAN_FROM_LOCATION_GID
columns.description: The plan from location GID. This value can be a different location from the actual source location defined on the order release. The plan from location is where the system will start to plan the shipments for the order release.

columns.name: PLAN_TO_LOCATION_GID
columns.description: Must be Y or N. Y indicates that the order should not be bundled with any others. Order releasing logic will copy this value from the order base when the order is released.

columns.name: ASSIGNED_SELL_ITINERARY_GID
columns.description: The sell side itinerary that was selected when planning the order release.

columns.name: INDICATOR
columns.description: An indicator field that can be set to display important information about the order release.

columns.name: BULK_PLAN_GID
columns.description: If the order was planned onto a buy shipment via the bulk plan process, then the global identifier for the bulk plan.

columns.name: BEST_DIRECT_COST_BUY
columns.description: The buy side best direct cost that was calculated if the order travels from the plan from to the plan to as a single direct order.

columns.name: BEST_DIRCOST_BUY_CURRENCY_GID
columns.description: The best buy direct cost currency.

columns.name: BEST_DIRECT_COST_BUY_BASE
columns.description: The best buy direct cost in the base currency.

columns.name: BEST_DIRECT_COST_SELL
columns.description: The sell side best direct cost that was calculated if the order travels from the plan from to the plan to as a single direct order.

columns.name: BEST_DIRCOST_SELL_CURRENCY_GID
columns.description: The best sell direct cost currency.

columns.name: BEST_DIRECT_COST_SELL_BASE
columns.description: The best sell direct cost in the base currency.

columns.name: BEST_DIRECT_RATEOFFER_GID_BUY
columns.description: The buy side rate offering used to calculate the best buy direct cost.

columns.name: BEST_DIRECT_RATEOFFER_GID_SELL
columns.description: The buy side rate offering used to calculate the best buy direct cost.

columns.name: BUY_GENERAL_LEDGER_GID
columns.description: The buy general ledger GID to be used for the order release costs.

columns.name: SELL_GENERAL_LEDGER_GID
columns.description: The sell general ledger GID to be used for the order release revenue.

columns.name: TOTAL_NET_WEIGHT
columns.description: The total net weight calculated from the order release lines.

columns.name: TOTAL_NET_WEIGHT_UOM_CODE
columns.description: The total net weight unit of measure.

columns.name: TOTAL_NET_WEIGHT_BASE
columns.description: The total net weight in the base unit of measure.

columns.name: TOTAL_NET_VOLUME
columns.description: The total net volume calculated from the order release lines.

columns.name: TOTAL_NET_VOLUME_UOM_CODE
columns.description: The total net volume unit of measure.

columns.name: TOTAL_NET_VOLUME_BASE
columns.description: The total net volume in the base unit of measure.

columns.name: SELL_BULK_PLAN_GID
columns.description: If the order was planned onto a sell shipment via the bulk plan process, then the global identifier for the bulk plan.

columns.name: TOTAL_SHIP_UNIT_COUNT
columns.description: The total number of ship units calculated from the order release ship units.

columns.name: LOAD_POINT
columns.description: The source load point for loading of the equipment if required.

columns.name: UNLOAD_POINT
columns.description: The destination unload point for the unloading of the equipment if required.

columns.name: PICKUP_IS_APPT
columns.description: A Y/N indicator for whether the early/late pickup times are appointment times

columns.name: DELIVERY_IS_APPT
columns.description: A Y/N indicator for whether the early/late delivery times are appointment times.

columns.name: PLAN_FROM_LOAD_POINT
columns.description: The load point associated with plan from location.

columns.name: PLAN_TO_UNLOAD_POINT
columns.description: The unload point associated with plan to location.

columns.name: USER_DEFINED1_ICON_GID
columns.description: Can store a user-defined icon that will appear within the user interface to help visually identify attributes of the order release.

columns.name: USER_DEFINED2_ICON_GID
columns.description: Can store a user-defined icon that will appear within the user interface to help visually identify attributes of the order release.

columns.name: USER_DEFINED3_ICON_GID
columns.description: Can store a user-defined icon that will appear within the user interface to help visually identify attributes of the order release.

columns.name: USER_DEFINED4_ICON_GID
columns.description: Can store a user-defined icon that will appear within the user interface to help visually identify attributes of the order release.

columns.name: USER_DEFINED5_ICON_GID
columns.description: Can store a user-defined icon that will appear within the user interface to help visually identify attributes of the order release.

columns.name: EXTERNAL_SYSTEM_ID
columns.description: The external system ID used for the source of the order release.

columns.name: PAYMENT_METHOD_CODE_GID
columns.description: The payment method GID.

columns.name: INCO_TERM_GID
columns.description: The INCO terms GID.

columns.name: TERM_LOCATION_TEXT
columns.description: Location text that can be entered.

columns.name: PLANNING_GROUP_GID
columns.description: The planning group GID to use when segmenting a large number of order releases into multiple smaller bulk planning runs.

columns.name: TIME_WINDOW_EMPHASIS_GID
columns.description: The time window emphasis to be used when calculating the best start times for shipment, it can emphasize the pickup or delivery windows.

columns.name: IS_KNOWN_SHIPPER
columns.description: A Y/N indicator for whether the shipper involved party is a known shipper for air travel.

columns.name: DIM_RATE_FACTOR_GID
columns.description: The dim factor GID to be used when calculating dimensional rates.

columns.name: RELEASE_METHOD_GID
columns.description: The release method GID is the order configuration rule and this drives the configuration of the order such as ship unit or line as well as various calculations.

columns.name: FINAL_INCO_TERM
columns.description: The final INCO term associated with the order release.

columns.name: FINAL_TEXT_LOCATION
columns.description: The final text location for the INCO terms.

columns.name: INSPECTION_NUMBER
columns.description: An inspection number for the order release for informational purposes.

columns.name: INSPECTION_SCHEDULE_DATE
columns.description: The inspection scheduled date associated with the inspection number.

columns.name: INSPECTION_DATE
columns.description: The inspection actual date associated with the inspection number.

columns.name: SURVEY_LAY_CAN_DATE
columns.description: The  survey lay can date for the order release.

columns.name: LOC_NUMBER
columns.description: The letter of credit number.

columns.name: LOC_ISSUE_DATE
columns.description: The letter of credit issue date.

columns.name: LOC_RECEIVED_DATE
columns.description: The letter of credit received date.

columns.name: LOC_LATEST_SHIPPING_DATE
columns.description: The letter of credit latest shipping date.

columns.name: LOC_NEGOTIATED_DAYS
columns.description: The letter of credit negotiated days.

columns.name: LOC_AMOUNT
columns.description: The letter of credit amount.

columns.name: LOC_AMOUNT_CURRENCY_GID
columns.description: The letter of credit amount currency identifier.

columns.name: LOC_AMOUNT_BASE
columns.description: The letter of credit amount in the base currency.

columns.name: LOC_ADVISING_NUMBER
columns.description: The letter of credit advising number.

columns.name: LOC_CONFIRMING_NUMBER
columns.description: The letter of credit confirming number.

columns.name: SRC_LOCATION_OVERRIDE_GID
columns.description: The source location override GID used to define a new source location scheduling the order while still retaining the original source location.

columns.name: DEST_LOCATION_OVERRIDE_GID
columns.description: The destination location override GID used to define a new destination location scheduling the order while still retaining the original destination location.

columns.name: PLAN_FROM_LOC_OVERRIDE_GID
columns.description: The plan from location override GID used to define a new plan from location scheduling the order while still retaining the original plan from location.

columns.name: PLAN_TO_LOC_OVERRIDE_GID
columns.description: The plan to location override GID used to define a new plan to location scheduling the order while still retaining the original plan to location.

columns.name: SECONDARY_T_WEIGHT
columns.description: The secondary total weight for the order that sums up  secondary weight values from the order release line.

columns.name: SECONDARY_T_WEIGHT_UOM_CODE
columns.description: The secondary total weight unit of measure.

columns.name: SECONDARY_T_WEIGHT_BASE
columns.description: The secondary total weight in the base unit of measure.

columns.name: SECONDARY_T_VOLUME
columns.description: The secondary total volume for the order that sums up the secondary weight values from the order release lines.

columns.name: SECONDARY_T_VOLUME_UOM_CODE
columns.description: The secondary total volume unit of measure.

columns.name: SECONDARY_T_VOLUME_BASE
columns.description: The secondary total volume in the base unit of measure.

columns.name: RATE_SERVICE_PROFILE_GID
columns.description: The buy rate service profile GID to be used as a constraint while planning the order release onto shipments.

columns.name: SERVPROV_GID
columns.description: The buy service provider GID to be used as a constraint while planning the order release onto shipments.

columns.name: SERVPROV_PROFILE_GID
columns.description: The buy service provider profile GID to be used as a constraint while planning the order release onto shipments.

columns.name: TRANSPORT_MODE_GID
columns.description: The buy transport mode GID to be used as a constraint while planning the order release onto shipments.

columns.name: MODE_PROFILE_GID
columns.description: The buy mode profile GID to be used as a constraint while planning the order release onto shipments.

columns.name: EQUIPMENT_GROUP_GID
columns.description: The buy equipment group GID to be used as a constraint while planning the order release onto shipments.

columns.name: EQUIPMENT_GROUP_PROFILE_GID
columns.description: The buy equipment group profile GID to be used as a constraint while planning the order release onto shipments.

columns.name: RATE_OFFERING_GID
columns.description: The buy rate offering GID to be used as a constraint while planning the order release onto shipments.

columns.name: RATE_GEO_GID
columns.description: The buy rate detail GID to be used as a constraint while planning the order release onto shipments.

columns.name: SELL_RATE_OFFERING_GID
columns.description: The sell rate offering GID to be used as a constraint while planning the order release onto shipments.

columns.name: SELL_RATE_GEO_GID
columns.description: The sell rate detail GID to be used as a constraint while planning the order release onto shipments.

columns.name: MUST_SHIP_DIRECT
columns.description: A Y/N indicator for whether this order release must ship direct.

columns.name: MUST_SHIP_THRU_X_DOCK
columns.description: A Y/N indicator for whether this order release must ship through cross dock.

columns.name: MUST_SHIP_THRU_POOL
columns.description: A Y/N indicator for whether this order release must ship through pool.

columns.name: SHIP_WITH_GROUP
columns.description: Ship with group tags orders that need to be placed on a shipment together.

columns.name: PRIMARY_LEG_SOURCE_LOC_GID
columns.description: Location GID of source for primary leg shipment

columns.name: PRIM_LEG_SRC_LOC_OVERRIDE_GID
columns.description: Location override GID of source for primary leg shipment

columns.name: PORT_OF_LOAD_LOCATION_GID
columns.description: Location GID of the port of load for the primary leg carrier.

columns.name: PORT_OF_LOAD_LOC_OVERRIDE_GID
columns.description: Location override GID of the port of load for the primary leg carrier.

columns.name: PORT_OF_DIS_LOCATION_GID
columns.description: Location GID of the port of discharge for primary leg carrier.

columns.name: PORT_OF_DIS_LOC_OVERRIDE_GID
columns.description: Location override GID of the port of discharge for primary leg carrier.

columns.name: PRIMARY_LEG_DEST_LOC_GID
columns.description: Location GID of destination for primary leg shipment.

columns.name: PRIM_LEG_DEST_OVERRIDE_LOC_GID
columns.description: Location override GID of destination for primary leg shipment.

columns.name: IMPORT_LICENSE_REQUIRED
columns.description: A Y/N indicator for whether this order requires an import license.

columns.name: IMPORT_LICENSE_ISSUE_DATE
columns.description: The import license issue date.

columns.name: IMPORT_LICENSE_RECEIVE_DATE
columns.description: The import license received date.

columns.name: IMPORT_LICENSE_EXPIRATION_DATE
columns.description: The date the import license will expire.

columns.name: IMPORT_LICENSE_NUMBER
columns.description: The import license number.

columns.name: LOC_EXPIRATION_DATE
columns.description: The letter of credit expiration date.

columns.name: IS_LOC_REQUIRED
columns.description: A Y/N field indicating whether a letter of credit is required for the order release.

columns.name: INSPECTION_REQUIRED
columns.description: A Y/N indicator for whether an inspection is required.

columns.name: UNITIZATION_CONDITION_NAME
columns.description: The unitization (loading of equipment) condition name value.

columns.name: STUFF_LOCATION_GID
columns.description: The location for stuffing (loading) the container prior to shipping.

columns.name: DESTUFF_LOCATION_GID
columns.description: The location for destuffing (unloading) the container after the ocean move.

columns.name: CUSTOMER_UNITIZATION_REQUEST
columns.description: The customer's request for unitization location.

columns.name: DEFAULT_STOWAGE_MODE
columns.description: The default stowage mode to use for this order when loading onto stowage consol shipments.

columns.name: CONSOLIDATION_TYPE_GID
columns.description: The type of consol (charter, vessel) to be used when assigning this order to the consol.

columns.name: MOVE_PERSPECTIVE_GID
columns.description: The mode perspective GID for the order release.

columns.name: QUOTE_GID
columns.description: The quote GID generated if this order release went through the quoting process.

columns.name: COMMERCIAL_PAYMENT_CODE_GID
columns.description: The commercial payment terms for the goods on the order release.

columns.name: IS_LOC_STALE
columns.description: A Y/N field indicating whether the letter of credit is stale or expired.

columns.name: ULT_DEST_COUNTRY_CODE3_GID
columns.description: The ultimate destination country code for this order release. It may be beyond the plan to or destination location defined on the order release.

columns.name: TEMPLATE_TYPE
columns.description: Hide template created for customer from other order UI. 'Customer' is for customer template.

columns.name: BUNDLING_TYPE
columns.description: AUTOMATIC or MANUAL ONLY allow bundling; they are distinguished only by user defined queries. DO NOT BUNDLE means order will never be bundled with other orders.

columns.name: IS_CONSOLIDATE_OR_EQUIPMENT
columns.description: Whether to consolidate order release equipment when bundling.

columns.name: DUTY_PAID
columns.description: Indicating if duty is to be paid for the order release.

columns.name: QUOTE_OPTION_NUMBER
columns.description: The quote option number for the order release. Informational.

columns.name: PARTITION_GID
columns.description: The partition GID used as according to this name, bulk plan partition orders to be planned together in one partition.

columns.name: TOTAL_DECLARED_VALUE
columns.description: The total declared value calculated from the order release lines.

columns.name: TOTAL_DECLARED_VALUE_GID
columns.description: The total declared value currency identifier.

columns.name: TOTAL_DECLARED_VALUE_BASE
columns.description: The total declared value in the base currency.

columns.name: BUY_ITINERARY_PROFILE_GID
columns.description: The buy itinerary profile GID to be used as a constraint while planning the order release onto shipments.

columns.name: SELL_ITINERARY_PROFILE_GID
columns.description: The sell itinerary profile GID to be used as a constraint while planning the order release onto shipments.

columns.name: BUFFER_TYPE
columns.description: Defines the buffer type if this order release is a buffer order that utilizes the buffer locations as points where the order will accumulate prior to moving on.

columns.name: SELL_SERVPROV_GID
columns.description: The sell service provider GID to be used as a constraint while planning the order release onto shipments.

columns.name: SELL_SERVPROV_PROFILE_GID
columns.description: The sell service provider GID to be used as a constraint while planning the order release onto shipments.

columns.name: IS_IGNORE_LOCATION_CALENDAR
columns.description: A Y/N field indicating whether the location calendar should be ignored when planning shipments for the order. If NULL, treat it as N.

columns.name: RATE_SERVICE_GID
columns.description: The buy rate service GID to be used as a constraint while planning the order release onto shipments.

columns.name: SHIP_UNIT_WIDTH
columns.description: The width of the ship unit. This will show a value only if the order release has one ship unit.

columns.name: SHIP_UNIT_WIDTH_UOM_CODE
columns.description: The ship unit width unit of measure.

columns.name: SHIP_UNIT_WIDTH_BASE
columns.description: The ship unit width in the base unit of measure.

columns.name: SHIP_UNIT_LENGTH
columns.description: The length of the ship unit. This column will show value only if the order release has one ship unit.

columns.name: SHIP_UNIT_LENGTH_UOM_CODE
columns.description: The length of the ship unit unit of measure.

columns.name: SHIP_UNIT_LENGTH_BASE
columns.description: The length of the ship unit in the base unit of measure.

columns.name: SHIP_UNIT_HEIGHT
columns.description: The height of the ship unit. This column will show value only if the order release has one ship unit.

columns.name: SHIP_UNIT_HEIGHT_UOM_CODE
columns.description: The height of the ship unit unit of measure.

columns.name: SHIP_UNIT_HEIGHT_BASE
columns.description: The height of the ship unit in the base unit of measure.

columns.name: SHIP_UNIT_DIAMETER
columns.description: The diameter of the ship unit for cyclindrical objects. This column will show value only if the order release has one ship unit.

columns.name: SHIP_UNIT_DIAMETER_UOM_CODE
columns.description: The diameter unit of measure.

columns.name: SHIP_UNIT_DIAMETER_BASE
columns.description: The diameter in the base unit of measure.

columns.name: TRANSPORT_HANDLING_UNIT_GID
columns.description: The transport handling unit associated with the ship unit dimension values. This columns will show value only if the order release has one ship unit.

columns.name: ON_RT_EXECUTION
columns.description: A Y/N field indicating whether that a shipment built from this order release has been assigned to a route instance leg. For migration: old existing order releases migrated to the default value ('N').

columns.name: IS_SPLITTABLE
columns.description: A Y/N field that indicates whether the order release can be split when planning during container optimization.

columns.name: PICKUP_ROUTING_SEQUENCE_GID
columns.description: The pickup location routing sequence that controls how the stops can be planned for pickup such as first, absolute first, last.

columns.name: DROPOFF_ROUTING_SEQUENCE_GID
columns.description: The pickup location routing sequence that controls how the stops can be planned for pickup such as first, absolute first, last.

columns.name: LATEST_EST_DELIVERY_DATE
columns.description: The latest estimate delivery date calculated from the last leg shipments.

columns.name: OTM_VERSION
columns.description: The OTM version number used when order was created.

columns.name: PRIORITY
columns.description: The priority associated with an order release.

columns.name: LATEST_EST_PICKUP_DATE
columns.description: The latest estimated pickup date calculated from the first leg shipments.

columns.name: MARKED_FOR_PURGE
columns.description: A Y/N field indicating whether this order will be processed to purge, when it is set to 'Y', this row and its child data will be purged.

columns.name: PICKUP_RAIL_CARRIER
columns.description: The pickup rail carrier used as identification on the shipment execution.

columns.name: DELIVERY_RAIL_CARRIER
columns.description: The delivery rail carrier used as identification on the shipment execution.

columns.name: EQUIPMENT_TYPE_GID
columns.description: The buy equipment type GID to be used as a constraint while planning the order release onto shipments.

columns.name: DOMAIN_NAME
columns.description: Database domain where this data is stored.

columns.name: INSERT_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data insert user.

columns.name: INSERT_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of data insert.

columns.name: UPDATE_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data update user.

columns.name: UPDATE_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of the most recent data update.

columns.name: RAIL_ROUTE_CODE_GID
columns.description: The buy itinerary profile GID to be used as a constraint while planning the order release onto shipments.

columns.name: EM_PHONE_NUMBER
columns.description: The emergency phone number when shipping hazardous materials. The 24 hours contact for the shipment.

columns.name: LEG_CONSOLIDATION_GROUP_GID
columns.description: The leg consolidation group set during planning.

columns.name: IS_PRE_ENTERED_PU
columns.description: A Y/N field indicating whether the order release is a pre-entered pickup for customs processing.

columns.name: ROUTING_CONSTRAINT_GID
columns.description: The buy itinerary profile GID to be used as a constraint while planning the order release onto shipments.

columns.description: Attribute fields (flexfields) allow you to add additional information about an object. Data type VARCHAR2 (150)

columns.name: ATTRIBUTE_NUMBER5
columns.description: Attribute fields (flexfields) allow you to add additional information about an object. Data type NUMBER

columns.name: ALLOCATION_GROUP_GID
columns.description: The allocation group that was calculated if the order travels from the plan from to the plan to as a single group order.

columns.name: EARLIEST_EST_PICKUP_DATE
columns.description: The earliest estimated pickup that was calculated if the order travels from the plan from to the plan to as a single estimated order.

columns.name: IS_TOPOFF
columns.description: This field indicates whether the order is a topoff order or not.

columns.name: EXTERNAL_VOYAGE_CODE
columns.description: Specifies the number of the voyage as assigned by the carrier.After the voyages are queried from an external voyage service and the user selects a particular voyage result,the voyage number selected for this result will be saved in this column.             This will be used while planning the order for a shipment.

columns.name: IS_DIRECT_VOYAGE
columns.description: The flag indicates whether only direct voyages, that is voyages without trans-shipments should be retrieved by an external voyage service.             It will be used for querying the voyage based on data from order release.

columns.name: PREDICTED_ORDER_ROUTE
columns.description: Stores the predicted order route path.
